title: Biometrics market players level-up from startups to heavyweight incumbents
description:
Biometric ID card contracts won by Madras Security Printers in the top stories of the week on Biometric Update illustrate the growing influence of India’s digital identity ecosystem on the global market. The merger of ForgeRock and Ping Identity results in a similar step-change for an IAM market leader, while a PopID marketing appearance shows the growing pains that face the players in a segment moving into the mainstream.

Top biometrics news of the week

A pilot project of air passengers using digital travel credentials to fly from Finland to the UK or Croatia has been launched. Participants can use the DTC to pass border contro

title: The future of facial recognition technology in India: Opportunities and challenges
description: The future of facial recognition technology in India: Opportunities and challenges Online September 13, 2023 at 3:00 PM IST Join RecFaces team as we explore the opportunities and challenges that lie ahead for the facial recognition technology in the Indian market. During the session, industry experts will share their insights on the following key aspects: - Current Landscape - Opportunities for different sectors (banking, transportation, retail, healthcare, education, government) - Challenges and Concerns - Regulation and Policy - Future Outlook If you are interested in the biometric technology or looking for a way to adopt
